MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of this at 7.05AM. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate a suspected substation fault and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 11.30AM. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.35AM on 24 October 2020.
